bug.author: follnoob
bug.description:
The command spacy.de.download --force throws following exception:
NameError: name 'shutil' is not defined
after looking in the file download.py I found out that you forgot to import shutils <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Operating System: Ubuntu 14.04 Python Version Used: 3.4.3 spaCy Version Used: 1.6.0 Environment Information:
